headline: Tell HN: Beware of Uber Eats Scam
description:
Proof and details here: https://twitter.com/DontStealMacOSY/status/1512491161751068673

In short, when there are no couriers available, Uber Eats will only show self-delivery restaurants that they only label as “limited delivery tracking”. They admit that they do no safety screening on these business and refuse to help you when you get scammed by a listing with a fake address and phone number.
description_zh-Hans:
证据和细节在这里：https://twitter.com/DontStealMacOSY/status/1512491161751068673

简而言之，当没有快递员的时候，Uber Eats只会显示他们只标注为 "有限的送货跟踪 "的自送餐厅。他们承认，他们没有对这些业务进行安全筛查，当你被一个有假地址和电话号码的列表骗了时，他们拒绝帮助你。
description_zh-Hant:
證據和細節在這裡：https://twitter.com/DontStealMacOSY/status/1512491161751068673

簡而言之，當沒有快遞員的時候，Uber Eats只會顯示他們只標註為 "有限的送貨跟蹤 "的自送餐廳。他們承認，他們沒有對這些業務進行安全篩查，當你被一個有假地址和電話號碼的列表騙了時，他們拒絕幫助你。
